channel.title: [317]FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt | We-are-done. Period
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][b]FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt[/b][/size]
[img]http://sphotos-f.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/422261_187879541354824_575956742_n.jpg[/img][/center] [center]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CetCq6xOxlo[/center]
[center][URL=http://www.youtube.com/FroyoScape/][img width=50 height=50]http://www.indyzoo.com/SiteAssets/YouTube%20icon%20button.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://www.facebook.com/FroyoScape/][img]http://www.steadmanuhlich.com/facebook-icon-50x50.jpg[/img][/url][url=http://froyoupdate.blog.com/][img]http://findicons.com/files/icons/1979/social/50/wordpress.png[/img][/url]
[center][b]Current stage: Programming Stage[/b][/center]
[size=18pt][b]What the heck Arham? What's 'Frogurt'?[/b][/size]
Frogurt is the first frozen yogurt. And it was in the 1970s, AKA old school. Get it? So then it's like,
[b]"FroyoScape - A taste of Old-School"[/b]
[hr]
[size=18pt][b]Back to the point...[/b][/size]
People seem to have lost the point in RSPS. Watch servers like Deathlypvpz, whose coders think they are the best. Who seem to have lost the point in RSPS. We all started from us trying to add new items, that was, in my opinion, the Old Stone Age, we just tried to add Dragon Claws, eventually we got it, bcp, we got it, but when it all happened, our trend looked upon older items again. And this cycle will continue. When we finally programmed all the new RS features (Hybrid PvP started this), it became the New Stone Age. However, we started to look upon our old items, the good feeling of successfully programming simple things. We thought to ourselves, "We made our RSPS just like RS! Now what? Uhh..." You just cannot think of anything due to you just copying RS. Same updates as RS. [b]For the servers that think that new things are awesome and program them, tell me this. Why should we play your server whereas RS has the same features but with the full features. [/b] [b]We are fully benefiting from RS if we copy, whereas, we should use our own ideas. [/b] [b]Andrew Gower wasn't born with these ideas, he made them up. That's how RS came to be. That's the RS we know now and use to love. That's the RS that got known world-wide and turned to a master piece by Jagex. [/b] [b]If they thought of there own ideas, we should. [/b] [b]We should make a new RS, a new RS with our own RSPS features. We should make anything our mind gravitates towards. We have the power in our brain's creativity to make a world-wide known RSPS. [/b] [b]Just only if we try. Do you think us programmers were made just to copy? No, we were made to build upon and make a better game.[/b]
[hr]
Here are FroyoScape, we don't take pride, but satisfaction. We don't have so much pride to the extent where we don't have crowns, but instead the duke (java's mascot).
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/swa1pl.gif[/img]
Moderators would be
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/sy3zg6.gif[/img]
The feather represents light in power. :)
I'm not sure, if we should have donator features or not. We'll see....
[hr]
[b]FroyoScape aims for everything mentioned above. I hope this sums it all up.[/b][size=1pt][/b][/size]
[hr]
[size=24pt][b]The Team[/b][/size]
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/swa1pl.gif[/img]arham 4 - Programmer/Owner/Animator [IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/5436/veteran.png[/img]ox random xi - Head Moderator [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/sy3zg6.gif[/img]amy_webb - Modeller/Moderator [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/sy3zg6.gif[/img]Flame_ - Tester and Moderator [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/swa1pl.gif[/img]AtomicInt_ - Programmer and Administrator
[img]http://i53.tinypic.com/swa1pl.gif[/img]arham 4- Owner of the building and building the building. [IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/5436/veteran.png[/img]ox random xi - Manages the community to make no fighting and a guard of the foundation. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/sy3zg6.gif[/img]amy_webb - Orders our chairs and tables. [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/sy3zg6.gif[/img]Flame_ - Finds the cracks of the walls and fixes all the people that abuse them. [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/swa1pl.gif[/img]AtomicInt_ - Veteran volunteer helping to build the building. [b]Greatly appreciate GFX person
[hr] [center][URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/338/topicserverupdates.png/][IMG]http://img338.imageshack.us/img338/7193/topicserverupdates.png[/img][/URL][/center]
We feel so awesome! A bunch of updates are coming up, so expect beta/pre-beta! Let me show you why,
Name(s) - Date - Description [code=Updates] Arham - 10/18/12 - Started project. Arham - 10/18/12 - Made 10% of tutorial island Arham - 10/19/12 - Rapid switching Arham - 10/19/12 - 6 skills added Arham - 10/19/12 - Patched 75% of PIs dupes Arham - 10/19/12 - Remade a new combat, not tested due to bug (See Bugs section) Kodiak - 10/20/12 - Perfected switching Arham - 10/20/12 - Server is so clean there is not a single second delay when you click an area Arham - 10/20/12 - Added cow milking Arham - 10/20/12 - Temporarily disabled tutorial island Arham - 10/20/12 - Fixed all conventions, everything should look tidy :) Arham - 10/21/12 - Starting Cook's Assistant Arham - 10/21/12 - Cleaned out process 75% thus making the server even more faster :) Arham - 10/22/12 - Added clipped npc walking and clipped npc attacking Arham - 10/22/12 - Added 100 shops Arham - 10/22/12 - Added 1300 npcs Arham - 10/22/12 - Added npc walking Arham - 10/22/12 - Added Grim Reaper - Only visible in October 25th - October 31st Kodiak - 10/22/12 - Found flaws in switching and fixed it Arham - 10/22/12 - 90% of Cook's Assistant added Arham - 10/26/12 - Added fight caves 100% Arham - 10/26/12 - Added fight pits - 80%? Arham - 10/26/12 - Firemaking, clipped and with ashes, added Arham - 10/26/12 - Farming, multi-patch support, added Arham - 10/26/12 - Cooking, with fish, meat, fire, and cooking range, added Arham - 10/27/12 - Added Warriors Guide Arham - 10/27/12 - Added genie lamp Arham - 11/20/12 - Removed the user: Sibor Arham - 11/21/12 - Removed all skills. Planning on rewriting those horridly coded skills. Arham - 11/22/12 - Started making Runecrafting Arham - 11/23/12 - Successfully programmed crafting runes. Arham - 11/24/12 - Successfully programmed pouches. Arham - 11/24/12 - Started programming Agility, will fix the pouch withdrawing glitch later. Arham - 11/24/12 - Successfully programmed all of the Agility skills data. Arham - 11/25/12 - Removed user: Kodiak Arham - 11/28/12 - Added user: Robby Arham - 11/30/12 - Removed user: xifeg Arham - 12/2/12 - Removed partnership with Hellz-End Arham - 1/4/13 - Partnership with Oblivion 2 Arham - 1/16/13 - Added NPC sounds. Arham - 1/16/13 - Added player sounds. Arham - 1/16/13 - Added regional music. Arham - 1/16/13 - New login music. Arham - 1/16/13 - Tweaks to combat! More better. Arham - 1/16/13 - New dialogue system. Arham - 1/16/13 - Some weapon sounds (including specs) Arham - 1/18/13 - Switched to runesource_rebuild. Arham - 1/20/13 - Switched to Hyperion. Arham - 2/1/13 - New models. Arham - 2/1/13 - Player ranks system. Arham - 2/1/13 - Planning on adding weapon anims. Arham - 2/2/13 - Planning on making something for event guy. Arham - 2/2/13 - Switched back to 377 cache. Arham - 2/3/13 - Added Event Guy in-game. Arham - 2/4/13 - New member: AtomicInt_ Arham - 2/8/13 - New running and energy system. Arham - 2/9/13 - Added skill updating interface! AtomicInt_ - 2/20/13 - New dialogue system. Arham - 2/22/13 - Runecrafting. [/code] Date - Name(s) - How disastrous (Huge, Medium, Easy) - Description - Fixed? - (Optional) Comments [code=Bugs] 10/20/2012 - Kodiak, Arham, and Andrew - Huge - Only one player can log in at a time - Fixed 10/21/2012 - Arham - Easy - Npcs can't walk - Fixed 11/23/2012 - Arham - Medium - Nullpointer when runecrafting - Fixed - Actually was easy rofl. 11/24/2012 - Arham - Medium - Nullpointer when storing pouches - Fixed - Again, was easy >.> 11/24/2012 - Arham - Medium - Nullpointer when withdrawing - Fixed 12/24/2012 - Arham & Sibor - Easy - Nothing happens when you click the alters - Fixed 12/24/2012 - Arham - Easy? - Glitch when you click pouch, it only takes one pouch and when you withdraw it out, it gives you 3. - Fixed 1/18/13 - NEW BASE ^ NONE OF THESE APPLY NOW 1/19/13 - Can't unequip items. 1/20/13 - NEW BASE AGAIN ^ NONE OF THESE APPLY NOW 2/9/13 - Fix some level up interfaces - Easy - Not fixed 2/22/13 - Messages show even if we do have the requirements. [/code] [b] Please note: All quests made by Froyoscape will either copy rs completely, copy rs with our own froyo twist, or be completely custom. You may suggest quest ideas if you'd like.[/b]
[IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img138/3746/cowmilking.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/2761098/Switching.gif[/img] [IMG]http://www.upload.ee/image/2761148/No_lag_walking.gif[/img] [IMG]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/5591/kewlv.png[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-a.xx.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ash3/150692_180232458786199_1833981048_n.png[/img] [img]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/v/549943_299865150135762_589433189_n.jpg?oh=edddaac0dce753a69d40a739ceeac73f&oe=510EC6C0&__gda__=1359987825_eb676ff8eef2aeba52552324ad5fa2a6[/img] [img]http://img836.imageshack.us/img836/3844/swordfz.png[/img] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HrrnKIbPG7M http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=imvexpKY9sg http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FoaPEpmU7Bo http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mzNKHx107FE
[hr]
Wish us luck!
[hr]
[b]Why is it named FroyoScape?[/b] I just thought of frozen yogurt and added scape to it lol.

item.title: [317]FroyoScape - A taste of Frogurt | We-are-done. Period
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

We are so sorry for the wait! I’m pretty sure you guys are asking for an excuse, so here is one:

[3/21/2013 6:06:54 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Lol sorry. [3/21/2013 6:07:03 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Hard day at school. >.> [3/21/2013 6:07:30 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Gotta go "represent the school" day after tomorrow then again go "represent the school" next week... [3/21/2013 6:08:23 PM] Jason Rivera: for [3/21/2013 6:09:40 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Competitions... [3/21/2013 6:10:29 PM] Arham Siddiqui: Gotta memorize 300 word's spelling, if they are noun, pronounces, verbs, or adjectives, and the definition of them by the day after tomorrow. [3/21/2013 6:10:33 PM] Arham Siddiqui: I was just like, dafuq... [3/21/2013 7:08:01 PM] Jason Rivera: damn
So that's kinda making me busy.

So, wgaf about me, let’s talk about the server.

The server’s expected stage to alpha is in 2 days. The content is not really enjoyable, so we will make this a closed alpha. However, we will make an open beta (hopefully) just to pay off the debt to you! So, stay tuned, these 2 days will be good ones indeed.

Read full topic
